description.value:
Leatherworkers are skilled artisans who tan, cut, and shape hides to create sturdy garments, armor, and adventuring gear. Their craft bridges the gap between protection and practicality, making them indispensable to any expedition.

  • Skill Advantage: A leatherworker has &reference[advantage] on checks involving leatherworking, including but not limited to some &reference[Engineering] and &reference[Nature] checks.

  • Craft: A leatherworker can craft one of the following over a long rest:

    • Armor: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.jSi9ralAm7FzUQbH]{Padded Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.0Kmj7Hk25ZyGURMI]{Leather Armor}, and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.O8vBudyTBZs03cTF]{Hide Armor}.*

    • Melee Weapons: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.GdgYGzD0cqVlYguz]{Whip}.

    • Ranged Weapons: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Ev7JyidZMB8BA9Cn]{Sling}.**

    • Misc: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.d3IPRk1kOVorUKAt]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.66fZUZojS0yTYCeu]{Map or Scroll Case}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.qTguz3rw6SQfD3JF]{Parchment} (x10), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.KZB1hMBtLdCIiOM2]{Pouch}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.AwKucAoy5Tksjf6V]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.9IHclHKLZ072kDBB]{Rope} (50 ft.), @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.JZErJp3ktez5s90X]{Waterskin}.

    • Limitations: A leatherworker cannot make &reference[adamantine], &reference[cold iron], or &reference[silver] whips.

* Magic padded or hide armor uses the statistics of magic leather armor.

** Slings come with Sling Bullets (x20) as needed at no extra cost.
